# EventGroup.NullEventGroup field

A special null event group that can be used to stop the [`CurrentEventGroup`](../Actor/CurrentEventGroup) from being passed along in a CreateActor or SendEvent call.

```csharp
public static EventGroup NullEventGroup;
```
